org.svvrl.goal.core.aut

Class AutomatonComponent

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.svvrl.goal.core.AbstractEditable
      • org.svvrl.goal.core.aut.AutomatonComponent
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.beans.PropertyChangeListener, java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.util.EventListener, Editable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Acc, GraphicComponent

    public abstract class AutomatonComponent
extends AbstractEditable
    An AutomatonComponent is a component of an automaton, for example, states, transitions, and acceptance conditions. These components know which automaton they belong to.
    Author:
    Ming-Hsien Tsai
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      • setAutomaton

        protected void setAutomaton(Automaton a)
        Sets the automaton where component is. This method does not guarantee that the automaton does contain this component.
        Parameters:
        a - the automaton supposed to contain this component
